author: Telegraph Video
title: Why Lewis Hamilton deserves our respect
text: Lewis Hamilton Why Lewis Hamilton deserves our respect Ahead of the US Grand Prix, and with Lewis Hamilton on the cusp of his third world title, watch the video to see how the British star's talent has been there from the start By Telegraph Video , video source Contented 1:58PM BST 23 Oct 2015
